item.title: How to use go-bindata with html/template
item.description: What is go-bindata and why do we need it? go-bindata converts any text or binary file into Go source code, which is useful for embedding data into Go programs. So you can build your whole project into 1 binary file for easier delivery. html/template html/template’s functions Parse, ParseFiles works only with files on the filesystem, so we need to implement a port to work with both approaches: files or go-bindata.
